src:
笛木優子、４０歳で第１子妊娠　昨年一般男性と結婚

02 Nov 2019

　ユミン名義で韓国でも活躍中の女優・笛木優子（４０）が２日、インスタグラムで「第一子を授かる事が出来ました」と妊娠を発表した。
　笛木は１８年６月に３年交際した１歳上の一般男性と結婚。「私事で恐縮ですが、この度、第一子を授かる事が出来ました」と喜びの報告した。
　今後も「体調と相談しながらではありますが、出来る範囲でお仕事させて頂いております」と無理のない範囲での仕事も継続する。「皆様のご理解心より感謝申し上げます」と記した。
text:
Yuko Fueki, first child pregnant at age 40, married a normal man last year

02 Nov 2019

Yuko Fueki (40), an actress who is also active in Korea under the name of Yumin, announced pregnancy on August 2 that she was able to give her the first child.
Fueki was married to a one-year-old general man who had a relationship for three years in June 2018. "I'm sorry for my personal affairs, but this time I was able to have my first child," reported a joy.
”We will continue to work in a reasonable range, saying,“ I will work as much as I can while consulting with my physical condition. ” "Thank you for your understanding."
